posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Dear students,

As all the course content has been completed, we have released the answer scripts for the GAs. Please feel free to learn from them. The author of the entire repository is Anand sir. So its a marvelous opportunity to learn from the master. All the code is what he has written for this course.

github.com

tools-in-data-science-public/src at tds-2024-t2 ·...

Contribute to sanand0/tools-in-data-science-public development by creating an account on GitHub.

The python files are the answer scripts. And the the javascript files are the question generating scripts.

Enjoy!

posts.name: Harish
posts.cooked:
Solutions for GA6.2 and GA6.3 are missing. Could you please share that @carlton.

Thanks

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked:
These are the same questions that everyone seemed to get wrong in GA6. No one from the course team has offered any explanation till now about what the issue was.

@carlton, is this because there was an issue with the script for GA6?

posts.name: Vijayanandam V M
posts.cooked:
@carlton , for GA6, 2 questions were wrong, and score supposed to be updated for all the students for the same. As of today GA6 this correction not done in the portal. Please review and confirm by when this would be completed ?

Thank you very much

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
@Vijayvm @iitmanupam @hari

All students that attempted GA6 q2 and q3 will be awarded marks (as there was an error in the answer key). The solution itself was discussed in the TA session.

Kind regards

posts.name: Vijayanandam V M
posts.cooked: Thanks @Carlton. This is not reflected in GA6 scores in the portal as of now.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
The re- scores will be pushed by tomorrow.

Kind regards
